itunes:title: Episode 555 - DB Sports Companion Show 02/25/20 - 9 Inch Hands!
title: Episode 555 - DB Sports Companion Show 02/25/20 - 9 Inch Hands!
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss why no one should care that Joe Burrow's hands measured in at 9 inches and why he will play for the Cincinnatti Bengals, the Kobe Bryant tribute at Staples Center yesterday, the recent proposal to have 17 regular s...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss why no one should care that Joe Burrow's hands measured in at 9 inches and why he will play for the Cincinnatti Bengals, the Kobe Bryant tribute at Staples Center yesterday, the recent proposal to have 17 regular season games in the NFL, Jose Altuve getting drilled in his first at bat in Spring training, and the crying Jordan meme that will now never go away.
